page.title: 14Employment cont
page.content: The majority of full time work is in shops,building work,fishing or professional services such as banks, building societies and schools. Another category of employment in the area is where residents travel out of the block.These people work in towns where there is a greater demand employees and a wider range of jobs to cater for their skills.The majority of these workers are employed in places like Truro,St.Austell and Falmouth, where there are more offices and industrial premises.These people travel either by private coaches operating a regular service or by private car.Because wages in the area are low or because many jobs are part time,a lot of families have to add to their income,often with the wife in the family working part time also. {PTO
